content: तॄ {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (तरति, ततार, अतारीत्, तरिरी-ष्यति, तीर्ण) {@--1@} To cross over, cross; केनोडुपेन परलोकनदीं तरिष्ये <ls>Mk. 8. 23</ls>; स तीर्त्वा कपिशां <ls>R. 4. 38</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 77.</ls> {@--2@} ({%a%}) To cross over, traverse (as a way); <ls>Ku. 7. 48</ls>; <ls>Me. 19.</ls> ({%b%}) To sail across, navigate (as a river). {@--3@} To float, swim; शिला तरिष्यत्युदके न पर्णं <ls>Bk. 12. 77.</ls> {@--4@} ({%a%}) To get over, surmount, overcome, overpower; धीरा हि तरंत्यापदं <ls>K. 175</ls>; कृच्छ्रं महत्तीर्ण. <ls>R. 14. 6</ls>; <ls>Pt. 4. 1</ls>; <ls>Bg. 18. 58</ls>; <ls>Ms. 11. 34.</ls> ({%b%}) To subdue, destroy, become master of. {@--5@} To go to the end of, master completely; <ls>R. 3. 30.</ls> {@--6@} To fulfil, accomplish, perform (as a promise); दैवात्तीर्णप्रतिज्ञः <ls>Mu. 4. 12.</ls> {@--7@} To be saved or rescued, escape from; गावो वर्षभयात्तीर्णा वयं तीर्णा महाभयात् <ls>Hariv.</ls> {@--8@} To acquire, gain. {@--9@} To move forward rapidly. {@--10@} To fill completely, pervade. {@--11@} To live through (a definite period). {@--12@} To deliver, liberate from. {@--13@} To strive together, compete. {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} (तीर्यते) To be crossed &c. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (तारयति-ते) {@--1@} To carry or lead over. {@--2@} To cause to arrive at. {@--3@} To save, rescue, deliver, liberate. {%--<ab>Desid.</ab>%} (तितीर्षति|तितरिषति, तितरीषति) To wish to cross &c.; दोर्भ्यां तितीर्षति तरंगवतीभुजंगं <ls>K. P. 10.</ls>
